text: anal, avarutaiya camukattaril kahpirkalay irunta talaivarkal; "ivar unkalaip ponra manitareyanri verillai ivar unkalai vita cirappup pera virumpukirar; melum, allah natiyiruntal avan malakkukalai(t tutarkalaka) anuppiyiruppan. Munnirunta nam mutataiyaritam i(ttakaiya visayat)tai nam kelvippattateyillai" enru kurinarkal
